version_description: Bug fixes and general improvements
Now you can save projects while browsing and get notified before they end. Just tap the heart on any project.
Kickstarter is officially available in Japan. Keep an eye out for more new and exciting projects from Japan.
Kickstarter is officially available in Japan. Keep an eye out for more new and exciting projects from Japan.
Bug fixes and general improvements
An updated look.
An updated look, plus a bugfix.

Bug fixes and general improvements

As we get ready for changes in data privacy laws, we’ve built some new features that help you manage the information you share with us. From the app settings you can:

- Opt in or out of email and push notifications about new messages
- Opt in or out of receiving project recommendations
- Opt in or out of following others’ activity and being followed
- Request your personal data
- Delete your account

For more information and to read our updated privacy policy, see: https://www.kickstarter.com/privacy
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements
We made small improvements that will help us find and fix crashes faster. We also updated the look of your privacy, newsletter, and notification settings.

Now you can make your profile public or private and more easily find your Facebook friends.

We also updated our newsletter descriptions so you have a better idea of what you're signing up for.

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

Wondering why you haven’t had an update in months? We’ve been working hard to make it easier for you to update your account settings right from the iOS app. You can now change your email, change your password, and update your currency preferences from your account settings.

Other notable features & bug fixes include:
- You can now tap any tab bar item to scroll to the top of the screen
- You can now view projects in your preferred currency
- Fixed an issue that was preventing some users from receiving push notifications
- Fixed an issue with displaying and pledging with decimal amounts
- Fixed an issue where there was a lag between when you saved a project and when it appeared saved

COMING SOON: Badges. We’ve heard you want them.

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it.

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

Wondering why you haven’t had an update in months? We’ve been working hard to make it easier for you to update your account settings right from the iOS app. You can now change your email, change your password, and update your currency preferences from your account settings.

Other notable features & bug fixes include:

- You can now tap any tab bar item to scroll to the top of the screen
- You can now view projects in your preferred currency
- Fixed an issue that was preventing some users from receiving push notifications
- Fixed an issue that prevented users from pledging with decimal amounts
- Fixed an issue where there was a lag between when you saved a project and when it appeared saved

COMING SOON: Badges. We’ve heard you want them.

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it.

Now, when you click on a project from one of our newsletters, it’ll open in the app.

We’re no longer supporting devices running below iOS 10. You can still download previous versions if you haven’t upgraded, but you’ll miss out on our latest features.
Bug fixes and general improvements.

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

We’ve been working to make it easier to update your account settings from the iOS app. Next up is the ability to view, edit, and add new payment methods. We’ve also made a ton of improvements to Voice Over accessibility within Settings.

Other notable features & bug fixes include:

- creators can now opt in to the new pledge activity summary email from their notification settings.

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it.

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

This release brings some improvements to how you can select a preferred currency within your account settings. We’ve also included other minor bug fixes and accessibility improvements.

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it."

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

This release brings the ability for users who’ve signed up using Facebook to create a password for their Kickstarter account. You can now also pull down on your projects feed to refresh it.

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it.

Kickstarter is 10! We're celebrating with hidden surprises you'll find in this release.

Thanks for everything you've done over the past decade to help bring creative projects to life.

P.S. If you love our app, please leave us a review—and if you have feedback to help us improve it, tell us that, too.
We’re no longer supporting devices running below iOS 11. You can still download previous versions if you haven’t upgraded, but you’ll miss out on our latest features.
We’re preparing for some exciting new releases in the app, so we cleared some space by tidying up a bit. Leave a review and let us know how we’re doing.
This latest release introduces red badges on the app icon when there’s new activity, including updates on projects you’ve backed, or new projects by creators you follow.

Thank you for helping bring creative projects to life.

We update our app from time to time to fix bugs and improve your experience. This is one of those times!

Thanks for using Kickstarter and happy backing!

PS. If you love our app, please leave us a review and if you don’t, leave us one too so that we can improve it.

Check out the rewards selection makeover—now you can swipe to make a selection while you back a project.

Try it out, leave a review, and let us know what you think.
We gave rewards selection a makeover so you can swipe to browse your options when backing a project. Try it out and leave a review—we’d love to hear your feedback.

Following up our recent makeover to rewards selection—we’ve added more exciting features to the checkout process. Now it’s easier than ever to back a project, manage your pledge, view your backer number, and adjust your shipping details.

Leave a review and let us know what you think of this new look and feel.

Following up our recent makeover to rewards selection—we’ve added more exciting features to the checkout process. Now it’s easier than ever to back a project, manage your pledge, view your backer number, and adjust your shipping details.

Leave a review and let us know what you think of this new look and feel.
We’ve been working hard to improve the Kickstarter app and incorporate your feedback. This release includes bug fixes, internal upgrades, and other updates to the experience.
We’ve been working hard to improve the Kickstarter app and incorporate your feedback. This release includes bug fixes, internal upgrades, and other updates to the experience.
We’ve been working hard to improve the Kickstarter app and incorporate your feedback. This release includes bug fixes, internal upgrades, and other updates to the experience.
We’ve been working hard to improve the Kickstarter app and incorporate your feedback. This release includes bug fixes, internal upgrades, and other updates to the experience.
We redesigned payment method selection so you can complete your pledges faster—try it out today by backing a new project and leave a review here if you’d like.

Now you can log in to Kickstarter with your Apple ID. In the app, you’ll see a collection of our Lights On projects to support creative spaces and businesses affected by COVID-19.

To help make sure creators get their funds and can bring their projects to life, we’ve also added push notifications and a clear in-app alert when we’re unable to collect your pledge. You’ll know how to fix your payment method—and how much time you have left to do it—so that your pledge isn’t dropped from the project.

This release introduces add-ons as a new type of reward option. When you back a project, you can include additional, optional (and sometimes multiple) rewards as part of your overall pledge. You’ll see available add-ons after you’ve selected your main reward tier, which allows you to customize your reward with greater detail.

And if you’d like to offer the creator a little extra money to help bring their project to life, you can also enter any amount you’d like into the “Bonus support” field. We’ve always had this function, but now it has its own space.

This release includes improvements, bug fixes, and upgrades to our new add-ons feature. Now you can include optional (and sometimes multiple) rewards to your pledge when you back a project, which you’ll see after you’ve selected your main reward tier.

And very soon, we’ll be launching Kickstarter in Greece, Poland, and Slovenia. Check back for more exciting updates, and leave us a review about add-ons if you find them in a project.

We’ve made discovery easier by introducing push notifications for news and projects chosen just for you. Once you’ve downloaded this version, go to Notifications in your Settings and tap the mobile icon for “Announcements” at the top, so you can receive alerts about new projects that we think you’ll love.
We’ve been working hard to improve the Kickstarter app and incorporate your feedback. This release includes bug fixes, internal upgrades, and other updates to the experience.

We’re improving our comments section with a refreshed look and feel. We’ll continue to upgrade this experience over the next few releases, so try out the latest version and let us know what you think in the reviews.
We’ve updated the comments section for all projects, so you can easily read the full conversation and engage in more meaningful exchanges.
